AST module

class AST.ASTNode[source]

Bases: object

Base class for all AST nodes.

class AST.AssignNode(LHS, RHS)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store instructions using ‘=’ in Renpy.

Attributes:

LHS: The left-hand side of the assignment. RHS: The right-hand side of the assignment.

class AST.DefineNode(id, value)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information from a define statement in Ren’Py language.

Attributes:

id: The identifier being defined. value: The value assigned to the identifier.

class AST.DialogueNode(speaker, text)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store a dialogue in Renpy.

Attributes:

speaker: The character or speaker of the dialogue (can be None for narration). text: The string content of the dialogue.

class AST.FunctionCallNode(name, args=None, kwargs=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store functions in Renpy.

Attributes:

name: The name of the function being called. args: Positional arguments for the function call (list of ASTNodes). kwargs: Keyword arguments for the function call (list of ASTNode).

get_character_name()[source]

Returns the first instance of StringNode (=character name) or UserNode (reference to character name) + color of associated character if it exist when the function used is ‘Character’

get_user_tokens()[source]

Collect all UserNode instances in args and kwargs of this FunctionCallNode

class AST.HideNode(image_expression=None, layer=None, transition=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information from a hide statement in Ren’Py language.

Attributes:

image_expression: List containing the image name and optional tags (e.g., [‘eileen’, ‘happy’]). layer: Optional additional layer. transition: Optional transition effect (e.g., ‘fade’, ‘dissolve’).

get_full_name()[source]

Return a string representing the full name of the image (e.g., ‘img_name tag1 tag2’)

class AST.ImageNode(image_expression, string_path=None, user_var=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information from an image statement in Ren’Py language.

Attributes:

image_expression: List containing the image name and optional tags (e.g., [‘eileen’, ‘happy’]). path: Optional explicit path to the image file. user_var: Optional variable referencing the image path.

get_value()[source]

Return the image path, or the user variable referencing it if no direct path exists.

class AST.JumpNode(label_name)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding the ‘jump’ instruction in Renpy.

Attributes:

label_name: The target label to jump to

class AST.KeywordNode(value)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information from a keyword in Ren’Py language.

Attribute:

value: The keyword string (e.g., ‘start’).

class AST.LabelNode(label, body=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information from a label statement in Ren’Py language.

Attributes:

label_name: The identifier of the label (e.g., ‘start’). body: List of AST nodes representing the statements inside the label.

get_next_label()[source]

Return the name of the next label found in the first JumpNode of the body.

class AST.LayerNode(layer_name)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding a layer in Renpy.

Attributes:

layer_name: The name of the layer where content is shown.

class AST.MasterNode(children=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Represents the root of the AST for a Ren’Py script.

This node contains a list of child AST nodes of any type, allowing the tree to represent the entire script hierarchy.

Attributes:

children: A list of all the nodes found in the renpy script.

class AST.PlayNode(audio_type, audio_file, fadein=None, loop=False)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding the ‘play’ instruction in Renpy.

Attributes:

audio_type: Type of audio (‘music’, ‘sound’, or ‘voice’). audio_file: The audio file or variable reference. fadein: Optional fade-in duration in seconds. loop: Whether the audio should loop continuously.

class AST.ReturnNode(value=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding the ‘return’ instruction in Renpy.

Attributes:

value: Optional value or expression being returned.

class AST.SceneNode(image_expression=None, transform=None, layer=None, transition=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information from a scene statement in Ren’Py language.

Attributes:

image_expression: List containing the image name and optional tags (e.g., [‘eileen’, ‘happy’]). layer: Optional additional layer. transform: Optional transform applied to the image (e.g., ‘left’, ‘right’). transition: Optional transition effect applied to the image (e.g., ‘fade’).

get_full_name()[source]

Return a string representing the full name of the image (e.g., ‘img_name tag1 tag2’)

class AST.ShowNode(image_expression=None, transform=None, layer=None, transition=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information from a show statement in Ren’Py language.

Attributes:

image_expression: List containing the image name and optional tags (e.g., [‘eileen’, ‘happy’]). layer: Optional additional layer. transform: Optional transform applied to the image (e.g., ‘left’, ‘right’). transition: Optional transition effect applied to the image (e.g., ‘fade’).

get_full_name()[source]

Return a string representing the full name of the image (e.g., ‘img_name tag1 tag2’)

class AST.StopNode(audio_type=None, fadeout=None)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding the ‘stop’ instruction in Renpy.

Attributes:

audio_type: Type of audio to stop (‘music’, ‘sound’, or ‘voice’). fadeout: Optional fade-out duration in seconds.

class AST.StringNode(value)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding a StringNode in Renpy.

Attributes:

value: The string value.

class AST.TransformNode(transform_name)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding a transform applied to an image.

Attribute:

transform_name: The name of the transform (e.g., ‘left’, ‘center’).

class AST.TransitionNode(transition_name)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding a transition in Renpy.

Attributes:

transition_name: The name of the transition (e.g., ‘fade’).

class AST.UserNode(name)[source]

Bases: ASTNode

Custom AST node used to store information regarding a user variable in Renpy.

Attributes:

name: The name of the identifier.
